effect_entries.effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes a mysterious air current.  A mysterious air current causes moves to not be super effective against Flying; they do neutral damage instead.  anticipation and stealth rock are not affected.

The mysterious air current ends when this Pokémon leaves battle or loses this ability, or when this ability is nullified.  The weather cannot otherwise be changed except by the effects of desolate land and primordial sea.

air lock and cloud nine will prevent the effect of a mysterious air current, but will not allow the weather to be changed.
effect_entries.short_effect: Creates a mysterious air current, which cannot be replaced and causes moves to never be super effective against Flying Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
变为令飞行属性的弱点
消失的天气。

ひこうタイプの　弱点が
なくなる　天気にする。

The Pokémon changes the weather to eliminate all
of the Flying type’s weaknesses.

Crea un clima che annulla i punti deboli
del tipo Volante.

Altera el clima para anular las vulnerabilidades del
tipo Volador.

Ändert das Wetter, um die Schwächen des Typs Flug
zu beseitigen.

Altère les conditions météo et annule les faiblesses
du type Vol.

變為令飛行屬性的弱點
消失的天氣。

ひこうタイプの　じゃくてんが
なくなる　てんきにする。

ひこうタイプの　弱点が
なくなる　天気にする。

Affects weather and eliminates all
of the Flying type’s weaknesses.

Crea un clima che annulla i punti
deboli del tipo Volante.

Altera el clima para anular las
vulnerabilidades del tipo Volador.

Ändert das Wetter. Schwächen
des Typs Flug werden beseitigt.

Altère les conditions météo et
annule les faiblesses du type Vol.

ひこうの　じゃくてんが
なくなる　てんきにする。
